SELECT *, user.user_nickname as article_user_nickname FROM ARTICLE article, USER user WHERE
article_reg_dt < '9999-12-31'
AND article.article_user_num_id = user.user_num_id
ORDER BY article_reg_dt desc
article_comments >= 0
AND article.article_user_num_id = user.user_num_id
ORDER BY article_hits desc
article_likes >= 0
AND article.article_user_num_id = user.user_num_id
ORDER BY article_likes desc
LIMIT #{printNum} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE( board_id, article_user_num_id, article_title, article_content, article_comments, article_reg_dt, article_modify_dt, article_hits, article_likes) VALUES( #{boardId},#{articleUserNumId},#{articleTitle},#{articleContent}, 0, now(), now(), 0, 0);
